duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop new client relationships and grow the business through active marketing to businesses with between 20 and 2000 employees.
Prepare and execute a business development plan and present sales materials to prospective clients.
Maintain internal contact management database and monitor frequency of client and prospect contact.
Provide strategic input to the Retirement Solutions division and responsible for team initiatives.
Tailor plan proposals and designs to benefit the needs of the employer and the participants by highlighting cost savings, tax benefits, and explaining investment funds and fees.
Demonstrate proficiency using Salesforce.com and Microsoft Outlook to stay connected with clients, streamline processes, and organize data.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree preferred. Series 65 Investment Producer Representatives (IARs) license required, or equivalent. Professional designation (i.e., advanced degree, CPA, CFP, QKA, QFPC, PPA®, CPFA C(k)P, AIF, etc.) highly encouraged.
